"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Placing a skull or zombie head on an armour stand and equipping it with a cursed chestplate will transform it into a phantom scarecrow."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.phantom_scarecrows.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Phantom scarecrows will shoot fireworks at phantoms above them.\n\nPhantoms shot by these projectiles will instantly die, but if the firework projectile hits a block, it will explode preemptively."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.phantom_scarecrows.2"}]}]
